name: Intune App - Documentation Generator
description: Intune App - Documentation Generator automates creation of comprehensive documentation for Intune-managed apps, serving admins and end users. It extracts app details, deployment steps, and configuration notes to produce ready-to-publish how-to guides and reference materials. Key features include template-based docs, auto-generated step-by-step instructions, and support for common Intune deployment scenarios.
author: Morten Glimme
